transition.label: initial_pc: int[0, 1]
pc = initial_pc, remaining_flips = initial_pc > 0 ? remaining_flips - 1 : remaining_flips

template.name: ObsOptimisedRegisterCorruption
OptimisedRegisterCorruption
VM

transition.label: first: int[0, 0], second: int[0, 0], third: int[0, 0], fourth: int[0, 0]
memory[g_userPin + 0] != memory[g_cardPin + 0] && memory[g_userPin + 1] != memory[g_cardPin + 1] && memory[g_userPin + 2] != memory[g_cardPin + 2] && memory[g_userPin + 3] != memory[g_cardPin + 3]
memory[g_userPin + 0] = first, memory[g_userPin + 1] = second, memory[g_userPin + 2] = third, memory[g_userPin + 3] = fourth

query.formula: // Goes through all paths and checks if they reach DONE or ERR.
// The attacker remains undetected at all time.

query.comment: Pure safety: "control: A[] not(lose)" <=> "control: A[] win"
Is it possible to be authenticated and not crash the VM whilst staying undetected?

query.formula: // The VM finishes the execution and ends in DONE whilst the attacker gets authenticated.
strategy Access = control: A<> vm.DONE && mem_u8(g_authenticated) == 170

query.comment: Is it possible to gain undetected access and increase ptc?

query.formula: // The attacker can gain undetected access.
strategy UndetectedAccess = control: A<> vm.DONE && mem_u8(g_authenticated) == 170 under Undetected

query.comment: Is it possible to not crash the VM and gain undetected access and increase ptc?
Is it not possible to crash the VM under a strategy which guarantees that every execution finishes and provides undetected access?
Is it possible to increase ptc whilst gaining undetected access?

query.formula: // The attacker will always be undected and may gain access
strategy WeakUndectedAccess = control: A[mem_u8(g_countermeasure) == 0 W (mem_u8(g_countermeasure) == 0 && vm.DONE && mem_u8(g_authenticated) == 170)]
query.comment:
"q RELEASE p" <=> "p WEAK (q && p)"
In my own words: "p has to holds atleast until p and q, or p must remain true forever" - In other words: "The attacker either stays undetected forever or gains undetected access at some point".
Release ("q RELEASE p"): "p" has to be true until and including the point where "q" first becomes true; if "q" never becomes true, "p" must remain true forever.

query.formula: // The attacker never crashes the VM.
E<> vm.DONE && mem_u8(g_countermeasure) == 0 && mem_u8(g_authenticated) == 170 under NoCrash
